explanation: Across the live chat, there are strong bullish signals for BTC. Multiple users mention bullish technical setups such as trend lines moving upwards, high volume candles, and expectations of new all-time highs (ATH). There are repeated confirmations of bullishness on higher time frames (4h, 1D), and positive stochastic indicators. Some users discuss entering long positions or already being in profit from longs. While there are some mentions of shorting, these are outnumbered by bullish and buy-side comments. The technical consensus is that BTC is expected to continue its upward move, with targets as high as 108,500 and beyond. Many are holding or looking to buy, and the sentiment is reinforced by correlations with tech stocks being green and overall market optimism.
